name: 實驗室輪調學習
comment: 除第一週在師大上課外，其餘上課地點均在中研院中研院B204 BRC,AS。
restrict: 允許重複修 ◎課程不開放上修
description: This course is designed to expose students to a variety of labs in biodiversity, and provide students with basic knowledge of different types of labs.
goals: Expose students to various research topics in biodiversity
